title: logic inside the disk controller chip that we had designed/ Sugar said

Sugar suspended shipments of the PC2286 and PC2386. In a bid to sort out the problem, he called in Western Digital, the U.S. company which is the world's largest supplier of hard disk drives. Western Digital replaced the faulty chip with a standard one of its own
